title: Typhoon Melissa strengthens; Landfall expected in Taiwan
snippet: Severe Typhoon warning issued for coastal Taiwan. Manufacturing hubs in Hsinchu and Taichung may face power interruptions and logistics delays of 48-72 hours.

title: Port Strike in Chennai disrupts logistics operations
snippet: Dock workers in Chennai have commenced a 24-hour strike. Cargo movement halted. Expect delays for shipments originating from Southern India.

title: Cyberattack targets critical energy infrastructure in Germany
snippet: Federal authorities investigate ransomware attack on regional power grid. No immediate impact to Dell facilities, but monitoring grid stability.

title: Civil Unrest in Bogota: Curfew Declared
snippet: Protests escalate in downtown Bogota. Staff advised to avoid city center. Office remains closed until further notice.

title: Power Outage affects Texas Grid
snippet: Rolling blackouts reported in Austin area due to severe heat. Dell HQ operating on backup generators.
